Pex | Senior JavaScript Engineer | Downtown, Los Angeles | REMOTE or ONSITE, FULL-TIME | Salary $110k+ & Equity | https://pex.com

Pex is an audio-visual reverse search engine, that uses the content as a base for its search (think of Google Image Search). We operate at a pretty large scale with some fun stack (https://softwareengineeringdaily.com/2018/06/22/video-search...).

We're looking for senior front-end developers experienced with React.

For remote, we have strong preference for US timezone. For onsite, we offer 30 days of paid vacation, fully covered health benefits (gold/platinum plan), commuter benefits, cover costs of visiting conferences, and more.

If you want to learn more, reach out directly to me at r@pex.com
